reviewText:
Very informative and entertaining. I watched it with my entire family and we were all fascinated. None of us had known of these events and four are from North Carolina. I left it at my son's fishing cabin in Tennessee so that his guests can watch it.
This DVD is highly recommended.

Excellent Presentation. Shows much of the Career of my Patriot Great6grandfather, Gov. John Sevier of Tennessee.
For all you US history buffs, I would highly recommend it !  JW
